Common Misconceptions
4/21
  • Java is an extension of HTML
  • Java is about applets in a Web page
  • Java is meant for client side/user interfaces
  • Java is an easy programming language to learn
  • Java is an easy environment in which to program
  • Java is interpreted, so too slow for serious applications
  • Java and JavaScript are similar
  • No need to learn Java, since tools will generate it
  • Java is just a marketing hype...
What is Java ?
